Returns

self (undefined) –

nearest_block_coordinates(x: int, x_max: int = 500) → list

Check from given x coordinate which block pair ist the nearest. [x_bot_left, y_bot_left, x_bot_right, y_top_right, x_top_right, y_top_right, x_top_left, y_top_left, block_number]

Parameters

  • self (undefined) –

  • x (int) – The x coordinate to check.

  • x_max=500 (int) – The maximum x value of the window. So basically the window x size.

Returns

list. A List of the cornder coordinates from the hole between the block pairs.

flappy_bird.constants module

The Game configs are read from the config.ini file

flappy_bird.constants.BIRD_COUNT = 350

Of how many birds does one Population consists.

flappy_bird.constants.BIRD_SIZE = 30

The Size of the Bird.

flappy_bird.constants.BIRD_X = 30

The x coordinate of the Birds.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_COUNT = 5

The number of blocks that are generated at the same time.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_DIST = 180

The distance between the blocks.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_HOLE = 90

The spacing between bottom and top block.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_MAX_HEIGHT = 310

The max hight of a block.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_MIN_HEIGHT = 130

The min hight of a block.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_SPEED = 1

The speed of the blocks

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_SPEEDUP = 0.0

The ration with which the blocks get faster over time.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_STARTPOINT = 170

The x startcoodinate for the blocks at the beginning of the game.

flappy_bird.constants.BLOCK_WIDTH = 52

The width of the blocks.

flappy_bird.constants.DISPLAYED_BIRDS = 50

How Many Birds are displayed on the window.

flappy_bird.constants.GAME_SPEED = 0.005

How often is the update function of the game called.

flappy_bird.constants.GRAVITY = 0.2

How strong are the birds pulled down.

flappy_bird.constants.JUMP_HEIGHT = 5

How strong do the birds jump.

flappy_bird.constants.MAX_GENERATIONS_WITHOUT_HIGHSCORE = 5

How many generation are allowed without breaking the highscore

flappy_bird.constants.NN_DECISION_SPEED = 0.05

How often are the Neural Network functions called.
